alert.note: Alert for Iowa (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 11 at 6:23AM CDT until July 11 at 11:00AM CDT by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 645 AM CDT FOR JOHNSON...EASTERN BENTON...NORTHERN WASHINGTON...WESTERN LINN AND EASTERN IOWA COUNTIES... At 623 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Shellsburg to Lone Tree, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Cedar Rapids, Iowa City, Vinton, Marengo, Marion, Coralville, North Liberty, Hiawatha, Robins, Williamsburg, Center Point, Kalona, Fairfax, Solon, Tiffin, Ely, Atkins, Walford, Urbana and Wellman. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
